### Post-Event Surveys for the Health and Air Quality Forecasting Program
#### Notice ID: cb-715-84688192
#### Solicitation Number: 5000076053-A

The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the provision of post-event surveys for the Health and Air Quality Forecasting Program. The Contracting Authority is Environment and Climate Change Canada.

#### Background
The Health and Air Quality Forecasting Program requires post-event surveys to be conducted within a stipulated maximum budget.

#### Procurement Details

* **UNSPSC Code:** 80171501 (Polling, survey and public opinion monitoring and analysis)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Traditional
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Trade Agreements:** The contract is open to trade agreements as specified in the RFP document

#### Contract Details
The Contract Period will commence on the contract award date and will end on March 31, 2025. The Contract will be administered in accordance with the terms and conditions as outlined in the bid solicitation.

#### Eligibility
All prospective bidders are expected to meet the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation and are eligible to submit a proposal, unless otherwise stated.

#### Supporting Documents
A Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available in English and French on the Canada Buy Service at the following links:

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29180/rfp-5000076053--eng_.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29180/ddp-5000076053--fr.pdf)
Additional documents, including questions and answers, are available on the Canada Buy Service.

#### Contact Information
For any queries related to this RFP, please contact:

* Annie Emard
* Phone: (819) 200-7216
* Email: annie.emard@ec.gc.ca
